claims.object: anterior rami of spinal nerves C5-T1

surface_layer.definition: The roots of the brachial plexus are formed by the anterior rami of spinal nerves C5-T1.

deep_layer.mechanism: The anterior rami of spinal nerves C5-T1 converge to form the roots of the brachial plexus.
deep_layer.origin: Formed by the convergence of the anterior rami of spinal nerves C5-T1.
